definitions.definition: Something that transforms , changing its own or another thing's shape.

A static device that transfers electric energy from one circuit to another by magnetic coupling; primarily used to transfer energy between different voltage levels, which allows the most appropriate voltages for power generation, transmission and distribution to be chosen separately.
A neural network architecture composed of layers of attention which takes sequences of tokens (representing text , images , audio , or other modalities) as input .

main_definition: Something that transforms , changing its own or another thing's shape.
secondary_definitions: ( electrical engineering ) A static device that transfers electric energy from one circuit to another by magnetic coupling; primarily used to transfer energy between different voltage levels, which allows the most appropriate voltages for power generation, transmission and distribution to be chosen separately.
( machine learning ) A neural network architecture composed of layers of attention which takes sequences of tokens (representing text , images , audio , or other modalities) as input .
( fiction ) Alternative letter-case form of Transformer .
